contentBlocks.heading: Synopsis
contentBlocks.body: Every evening, as the sun dips below Manila Bay, a transformation takes place.

contentBlocks.heading: Behind the Camera
contentBlocks.body: Shot over 14 evenings across three months, the film uses only natural light.

contentBlocks.quote: Golden hour is when the city finally breathes.
contentBlocks.author: Mang Tonyo, Manila Bay Fisherman
